summary: Provides unit tests that verify the audio preprocessing pipeline, checking that converting a waveform to a spectrogram and back preserves the signal within acceptable error bounds and that the module interfaces behave as expected.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of audio-to-spectrogram and spectrogram-to-audio transformations used in speech recognition systems, preventing regressions and ensuring high-quality audio processing for downstream ASR models.
